alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Macon; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:17PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elmore, north central Macon and southeastern Tallapoosa Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 417 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Martin Dam, or 8 miles north of Tallassee, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallassee, Notasulga, Martin Dam, Liberty City, Southern Lake Martin, Yates Dam, Reeltown and Yates Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for east central Alabama.
